Articles.Content:
July 28, 2012

Media Advisory K11-002

Intrepid Astronaut Ed Kerman Stranded In Solar Orbit

KERBAL SPACE CENTRE TRACKING STATION, Ker -- Media representatives from all corners of Kerbin are invited to cover 'Kerman Rescue, KSP Plays a Part', a challenge thread in which brave Kerbal Space Engineers attempt to rescue Ed Kerman from solar orbit. Ed only has 1% of his fuel left since he was advised to keep some in reserve even after the last-ditch attempt to avoid escaping the Munar sphere of influence, so a very close rendezvous will be necessary. It is imperative he is recovered as quickly as possible - a state-of-the-art space suit has preserved his life for 50 days already, and we have reason to believe it will cease to function after a short while. Good luck!

Challenge: Rescue Ed Kerman

Allowed Mods: MechJeb and Crewtank. (Bonus points for not using MJ or even going totally Vanilla)
